Dialogs.Text: LostDecipher2: Even if i don't have access to the backend i can tell because the full URL of the image is present in the name.
MsMaki95: Oh that, yeah, we just need to test it to prove it.
MsMaki95: Yeah, i mean, in order to test that's actually the case, we need to check it somewhere else. Reproduce it.
LostDecipher2: Right, this guy can't just simply take my word. Is there another place you can put an image and shows it's name?
MsMaki95: I think the art gallery will be a good place for that.
LostDecipher2: That's were you left your cards, right?
MsMaki95: Oh, so that's how you entered to my room. Yeah, that's the place!
MsMaki95: Allright then! To the gallery we go! (PORTRAITS LEFT)
